meanings.definition: To cry out in a loud voice; shout.
meanings.sent1: I heard my mom call my name from the kitchen.
meanings.sent2: The coach had to call out the play for the team.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to call for attention by meowing loudly.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm seemed to call out warnings in the dark sky.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's call for silence echoed through the classroom.

meanings.definition: To communicate or try to communicate with someone by telephone.
meanings.sent1: I will call you later to discuss the project details.
meanings.sent2: She called her friend to invite her to the party.
meanings.sent3: The phone seemed to call out for attention with its ringing.
meanings.sent4: The urgent call from the boss made her heart race.
meanings.sent5: The call from the hospital brought both worry and relief.

meanings.definition: To give a specified name or title to.
meanings.sent1: They decided to call their new puppy 'Buddy'.
meanings.sent2: The author chose to call her book 'The Mystery of the Missing Key'.
meanings.sent3: The kids wanted to call their secret club 'The Adventure Seekers'.
meanings.sent4: The ancient ruins were often called 'The Lost City'.
meanings.sent5: The majestic mountain was aptly called 'The Peak of Serenity'.

meanings.sent1: I will call at your house on my way home from work.
meanings.sent2: She called on her friend to drop off the gift.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel decided to call by the bird feeder for a quick snack.
meanings.sent4: The butterfly called in the garden for a moment of rest.
meanings.sent5: The traveler planned to call by the famous landmark for a photo.

meanings.definition: To predict or describe as being.
meanings.sent1: The weather forecast called for rain all day.
meanings.sent2: He called it a success even before the results were in.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller called the future full of surprises.
meanings.sent4: The old legend called the hidden treasure a test of bravery.
meanings.sent5: The historian called the ancient civilization a marvel of engineering.
